description: Complete system overview documenting the AI-powered email management platform, key components, and architecture patterns
Detailed documentation of the email categorization algorithms, screening system, and automated routing logic including Hey-style workflow implementation
Comprehensive documentation of data models including email threading, contact relationships, timeline events, and folder organization structures
Details of AI integration patterns including sentiment analysis, writing suggestions, thread summarization, and context management
Documentation of the multi-provider email sync system including delta sync strategies, threading logic, and provider-specific optimizations
